subject: Freestyle Skiing
Avalanches
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Pierre was a professional big-mountain skier, and his monumental leap in the Teton Mountains in 2006 was considered to have set the world height record for a cliff jump on skis.
snippet: Pierre was a professional big-mountain skier, and his monumental leap in the Teton Mountains in 2006 was considered to have set the world height record for a cliff jump on skis.
